posts.post_content:
Hi all.

I am in search of a T206 Wheat with an American Beauty 460 back. 

I am not concerned with the technical, only the eye appeal.

If anyone has one available, I would love to discuss a potential deal.

Thank You.

Derek

If you would like to trade, I currently have the following pieces available:

1.) Jack Pfeister (throwing) ... American Beauty 350 (no decorative frame) ...
this one is raw, and has creasing in the shape of a "t". The back still presents well in my opinion.

2.) Bill Carrigan ... Sweet Cap 350 f.30 ... PSA 5

3.) Ed Reulbach (glove shows) ... Piedmont 150 ... PSA 3

4.) Chief Meyers (fielding) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 3

5.)Doc White (portrait) ... Piedmont 350 ... PSA 4

6.) Johnny Evers (portrait) ... Piedmont 150 ... PSA 2

7.) Johnny Evers (Cubs on shirt/blue sky) ... Piedmont 150 ... SGC 30 2

8.) Mordecai Brown (Cubs on shirt) ... Sweet Cap 150 f.30 ... SGC 40 3

9.) Rube Marquard (portrait) ... Piedmont 350 ... SGC 50 4

10.) Shag Shaughnessy ... Old Mill ... SGC 40 3
Oh, for the love of bump!!!!
